sentences.en: a solution that would bring lasting peace
sentences.cn: 将带来持久和平的解决方案

sentences.en: After a much more painful siege , lasting three months, Malaga fell too.
sentences.cn: 经过三个月更艰苦的围攻后, 马拉加也遭沦陷.

sentences.en: After a pursuit lasting all day we finally caught up with them.
sentences.cn: 经过一整天的追赶,我们终于赶上了他们.

sentences.en: After an artillery bombardment lasting several days the town finally succumbed.
sentences.cn: 在持续炮轰数日后,该城终于屈服了.

sentences.en: Even minor head injuries can cause long-lasting psychological effects.
sentences.cn: 即使是轻微的头部创伤也会对心理产生长期影响。

sentences.en: He had earned their lasting enmity.
sentences.cn: 他招致他们长期的敌视.

sentences.en: Her words left a lasting impression on me.
sentences.cn: 她的话给我留下了难忘的印象。

sentences.en: I acquired lasting respect for tradition and veneration for the past.
sentences.cn: 我开始对传统和历史产生了持久的敬慕.

sentences.en: Only the achievement of these goals will bring lasting peace.
sentences.cn: 只有达成这些目标才会带来持久的和平。

sentences.en: Sugar gives quick relief to hunger but provides no lasting nourishment.
sentences.cn: 糖能快速缓解饥饿感，但不能提供持久的营养。

sentences.en: The lasting war debased the value of the dollar.
sentences.cn: 持久的战争使美元贬值.

sentences.en: The only lasting solution lies in a political settlement. Without it, their descent into chaos will be guaranteed.
sentences.cn: 唯一的长久之计是通过政治手段解决。否则，他们势必会陷入一片混乱。

sentences.en: The quality of his character and the caliber of his accomplishments produced a lasting influence.
sentences.cn: 他的优秀品格和卓越成就影响深远。

sentences.en: The reforms will bring lasting benefits.
sentences.cn: 改革将带来长久的利益。

sentences.en: Their generosity made a lasting impression on me.
sentences.cn: 他们的慷慨给我留下了难忘的印象。

sentences.en: There is a fear that the freeze on bank accounts could prove a lasting deterrent to investors.
sentences.cn: 人们担心冻结银行账户可能会长期阻碍投资。

sentences.en: This should help him form lasting relationships.
sentences.cn: 这应该能帮助他建立持久的关系。

sentences.en: Webster's longest lasting legacy is the changes he proposed in spelling.
sentences.cn: 韦伯斯特最深远最持久的影响在于他提出的关于拼写方面的改变.

trans.tran_en: strong enough, well enough planned etc to continue for a very long time
